DialogueText:
There must be some sort of clue there. I'll wait here while you go searching that way I can be well rested to investigate your find!
QUEST:Kill Baby Boa Snakes until you find a clue

There must be some sort of clue there. I'll wait here while you go searching that way I can be well rested to investigate your find!
QUEST:Kill Baby Boa Snakes until you find remnanets of the gem thief. Baby Boas are on the next map.

Kacaw!
'The bird awaits the return of the town gem. They're ready to restore the gem to the portal allowing travel to World 2. They look very stylish in their matching orange hat and scarf.'

Kacaw!
'Defeat the Boss at the end of World 1 to retrieve the gem. The bird will use the gem to fix the portal allowing travel to World 2. The bird looks very stylish in their matching orange hat and scarf.'
One... two... THREE!!! Oh and these monsters have Increased Damage watch out! If you fail you can forfeit and retry using the Codex!

One... two... THREE!!! Oh and these monsters have Increased Damage watch out!
QUEST:Kill the green mushrooms! If you fail forfeit the quest using the Codex and retry!
Why don't you go 'ask' the frogs around here for some Condiments. Those Fists of yours seem like persuasive talkers! I'll hold onto these nomwiches in the meantime... for safe keeping you know?

Why don't you go 'ask' the frogs around here for some Condiments. Those Fists of yours seem like persuasive talkers! I'll hold onto these nomwiches in the meantime... for safe keeping you know?
QUEST:Kill frogs for condiments! Use your blue time candies to speed it up.
